title: (x) Garnett Hill serif face - Weiss Antiqua {Akira}
content:
I’ve looked at several possibilities but can’t seem to identify this. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

comments.content: Great. Weiss didn’t show up on my radar when I was looking. Thank you.
